message:
Title: "The Dance of Politics"

In the garden of power grows,
But where loyalty sows, no one knows,
Blue herbivores, red carnivores,
In this ballet of dinosaurs,
An unexpected peace unfolds.
prompt: The UK’s deal with Rwanda must stay within the rule of law | Damian Green Tuesday’s vote on the Rwanda legislation proposed by the government will be consequential both politically and in terms of the policy substance. Moderate and pragmatic Conservative MPs are always inclined to be loyal to the leadership. Indeed, we are often portrayed as herbivores, as opposed to the carnivores among our colleagues. Since their recent diet has mainly been Conservative prime
